Ravioli = Italian hill
Seven Hills
Seven Hills for Seven Brothers.
Seven Brothers in Seven Kingdoms.
Seven Ronin Hills.

E = Etymology.  

In Russian "Ronin" is obviously a surname = "son of Ronya" < diminutive for Ronald.

Seven Russian Sons Of Ronald Hills

In American, Ronald goes with MacDonald.

The Golden Arch Mountains.

McDonald's is worse than KFC. 

Colonel Sanders's mountains.

The Colonel Mountains get colonized by the surface base mounted there.

Colonized Mountained Base

Gets taken over by soft Jebs.

Mount Plushmore.
Soft Jebs contain flammable cotton. I set the mountain on fire, leaving a small pile ashes, which I claim as mine.

Dust! Sans come from dust. 

My Sans.

Please post in English when not using the International subforums.

The dust is fertalised and grows a new hill. Sans is just a font.

My No Sans hill.

I played MONODEVONIO to everyone.

Everyone was effected by the song.They act like ssssaaannnnssss.

I wear a earmuff so I was not effected.

My hill.
Mono starry Hill. (monks and not stereo.)

I build a control point on top of <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>. 

And I put 100 SAM missile base around the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> to protect it. 

My control point.

All the SAMs got hacked and blew up the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>.

Rubble Hill.

My SAMs were Hack-proof. 

Hack failure.

All my Hackman's were Gene proof.

Lex Luthor Fortress Hill.
